授業目的: The main purpose of this class is to develop students’ ability to write various kinds of texts. Students begin by writing paragraphs, and then short, multi-paragraph essays.　To improve fluency students will keep a journal that must be completed weekly.
到達目標: The aim of this course is to help students write clearly in English on a number of  topics and to bridge the gap between short assignments and longer research papers.
特記事項: 本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。 The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業方法: Each session will consist of a few different activities. Most sessions will begin by sharing out-of class writing, such as journals and essay drafts. During sharing activities, students will work in groups to read, discuss, and provide feedback on each other's writings. This will be followed by textbook study, usually in pairs. At the end of the lesson, the teacher will comment on students' writings and point out strengths and weaknesses and also offer general advice. In some sessions, a quiz or timed writing assignment will replace some of the other work.
